org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers

Class AbstractLSTM

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers.Layer
      • org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers.BaseLayer
        • org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers.FeedForwardLayer
          • org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers.BaseRecurrentLayer
            • org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers.AbstractLSTM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, TrainingConfig
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GravesLSTM, LSTM

    public abstract class AbstractLSTM
extends BaseRecurrentLayer
    LSTM recurrent net, based on Graves: Supervised Sequence Labelling with Recurrent Neural Networks http://www.cs.toronto.edu/~graves/phd.pdf
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
